Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000216 affecting package libglvnd for versions less than 1.7.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-1000216 affecting package libglvnd for versions less than 1.7.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libglvnd is earlier than 1.7.0-2, affected by CVE-2018-1000216
